vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.xmlwriters

Class XMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.xmlwriters.XMLWriter

  • public class XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that creates the xml document for saving the game in. Uses input from the game editor classes.
    Author:
    Leonard K. Ng'eno, Angelica Schwartz

      • addMapToGame

        public void addMapToGame(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String image,
                java.lang.String width,
                java.lang.String height,
                java.lang.String tileSize,
                java.lang.String map)
        Adds a map to the XML file.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the map, used as a tag. This name will be formatted.
        image - A string URL to the background image
        width - The width determined by the user
        height - The height of the map determined by the user
        tile - Size The size of a tile
        map - The grid

      • addPlayerToGame

        public void addPlayerToGame(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
        writes the player to the XML file.
        Parameters:

      • addGameElementToGame

        public void addGameElementToGame(java.lang.String type,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String path,
                        java.lang.String dimension,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes,
                        java.lang.String actions)
        Creates a new game element based on user input and adds it to the game.
        Parameters:
        type - Determines the type of element
        name - is the game element's name
        path - is the image path
        attributes - is the map of attribute name to value
        actions - is the map of action name to value

      • addRulesToGame

        public void addRulesToGame(java.lang.String rulesText)
        adds the rules to the game.
        Parameters:
        rulesText -

      • addLevelToGame

        public void addLevelToGame(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String rules,
                  java.lang.String actions)
        Creates a new level in the game and adds it to the XML file.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the level
        rules - A map of rules, which controls different instructions for updating scores and determining other game states
        actions - Any action present in the game.

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile(java.lang.String name)
        Saves the XML file.

      • getUnits

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUnits()
        Gets the list of already created units.
        Returns:
        a list of unit names as strings.
